EmailTemplate.name: Email 2a: Vaccine Verification Results (ACCEPTED)
EmailTemplate.subject: Your COVID-19 vaccination record has been verified for Salesforce at Davos
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
-Please do not forward- Hi {!Contact.Name},
To help ensure the health and safety of our in-person attendees, and the community at Davos, we have protocols in place before and during the event.
Great news — your vaccination status has been verified. Every step you take in our safety protocol goes a long way in keeping everyone safe — thank you! Questions? Please reach out to davos@salesforce.com.
We look forward to welcoming you safely in Davos!
Thanks, Salesforce Davos Team
Please note that any handling of your personal data will be done in accordance with the Salesforce Privacy Statement.
